ygData.subject: on switching servers for a guild
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Shadowknights, I m fairly sure that once a guild is approved, it can be set on any or all servers, but I was wondering how.  Must you re-create the
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Shadowknights,

I'm fairly sure that once a guild is approved, it can be set on any or
all servers, but I was wondering how. Must you re-create the same
character, and then talk to a GM? Or is is more complicated? Recently, I
started a guild on Tunare with another character, and now I'd like to
have it on Rallos Zek, because it is probably the greatest server for
roleplaying, hands down. Any advice is appreciated!
Thanks,

Envy (tunare)
Shadow Striders

(aka- Sugan on Tunare and 'Zek)
